name: xN1ckuz's SideBox
subtitle: Tweaked & Custom Apps, All in One Repo.
description:
Welcome to my source! üéâ
Here you'll find IPA apps and tweaks, always updated and ready for download via Sidestore/AltStore.

apps.name: Spotify Premium
apps.subtitle: Spotify Premium Tweak.
apps.localizedDescription:
Eevee Spotify
This tweak makes Spotify think you have a Premium subscription, granting free listening, just like Spotilife, and provides some additional features like custom lyrics.
Restrictions
‚Ä¢ Very High audio quality
‚Ä¢ Native playlist downloading (you can download podcast episodes though)
‚Ä¢ Jam (hosting a Spotify Jam and joining it remotely requires Premium; only joining in-person works)
‚Ä¢ AI DJ/Playlist
‚Ä¢ Spotify Connect (When using Spotify Connect, the device will act as a remote control and stream directly to the connected device. This is a server-sided limitation and is beyond the control of EeveeSpotify, so it will behave as if you have a Free subscription while using this feature.)
Lyrics Support
EeveeSpotify replaces Spotify monthly limited lyrics with one of the following four lyrics providers:
‚Ä¢ Genius: Offers the best quality lyrics, provides the most songs, and updates lyrics the fastest. Does not and will never be time-synced.
‚Ä¢ LRCLIB: The most open service, offering time-synced lyrics. However, it lacks lyrics for many songs.
‚Ä¢ Musixmatch: The service Spotify uses. Provides time-synced lyrics for many songs, but you'll need a user token to use this source. To obtain the token, download Musixmatch from the App Store, sign up, then go to Settings > Get help > Copy debug info, and paste it into EeveeSpotify alert. You can also extract the token using MITM.
‚Ä¢ PetitLyrics: Offers plenty of time-synced Japanese and some international lyrics.
If the tweak is unable to find a song or process the lyrics, you'll see a "Couldn't load the lyrics for this song" message. The lyrics might be wrong for some songs when using Genius due to how the tweak searches songs. While I've made it work in most cases, kindly refrain from opening issues about it.

‚Ä¢ Updated Italian localization

privacy.NSBluetoothAlwaysUsageDescription: This lets you unlock new ways of interacting with other devices compatible with Spotify via Bluetooth.
privacy.NSCameraUsageDescription: This lets you scan Spotify Codes.
privacy.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: Your data will be used to deliver personalized ads or content to you.
privacy.NSHealthUpdateUsageDescription: Spotify will use HealthKit data to provide personalised audio recommendations for your workouts.
privacy.NSMotionUsageDescription: We will use this to understand which audio motivates you most.
privacy.NSBluetoothPeripheralUsageDescription: This lets you unlock new ways of interacting with other devices compatible with Spotify via Bluetooth.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: This lets you save images to your Photo Library.
privacy.NSLocalNetworkUsageDescription: This lets you listen on different devices. Spotify will also get access to local audio files.
privacy.NSHealthShareUsageDescription: Spotify will use HealthKit data to provide personalised audio recommendations for your workouts.
privacy.NSAppleMusicUsageDescription: This will let you play your imported music on Spotify.
privacy.NSCalendarsUsageDescription: This lets Spotify view and add events to your calendar.
privacy.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This lets you control Spotify using your voice.
privacy.NSCalendarsWriteOnlyAccessUsageDescripti: This lets Spotify add events to your calendar.
privacy.NSFaceIDUsageDescription: This lets you set access restrictions using Face ID.
privacy.NSContactsUsageDescription: This lets Spotify access calendars you may have shared with your contacts.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This lets you select images from your Photo Library.

apps.name: YouTube Plus
apps.subtitle: YouTube Premium Tweak.
apps.localizedDescription:
A flexible enhancer for YouTube on iOS, featuring over hundred customizable options.
Main Features:
‚Ä¢ Download videos, audio (including audio track selection), thumbnails, posts, and profile pictures
‚Ä¢ Copy video, comment, and post information
‚Ä¢ Interface customization: Remove feed elements, reorder tabs, enable OLED mode, and as use Shorts-only mode
‚Ä¢ Player settings: Gestures, default quality, preferred audio track
‚Ä¢ Save, Load and Restore settings. Clear cache once or automatically on app startup
‚Ä¢ Built-in SponsorBlock
YouTube Plus preferences can be found in the YouTube Settings.

versions.localizedDescription:
‚Ä¢ Updated YouTube to 20.44.2
‚Ä¢ Updated YouTubePlus 5.2b4
‚Ä¢ Fixed Shorts overlay issues
‚Ä¢ Fixed playback issues
‚Ä¢ Fixed ‚ÄúHold to speed‚Äù gesture in Shorts
‚Ä¢ Fixed big gap under progress bar when action bar is disabled
‚Ä¢ Fixed colored progress bar issues (now supports gradient color for watched progress)
‚Ä¢ Fixed issue where some buttons under the player were not hiding
‚Ä¢ Fixed transparent background in the ‚ÄúExplore‚Äù sidebar
‚Ä¢ Fixed hiding options in YouTube sheet and added ability to hide the ‚ÄúFeedback‚Äù element
‚Ä¢ Fixed crash on live videos when original captions were set as preferred
‚Ä¢ Fixed ‚ÄúRemember loop mode‚Äù not saving correctly
‚Ä¢ Added option to hide ‚ÄúHype‚Äù and ‚ÄúStop Ads‚Äù buttons under the player
‚Ä¢ Added option to hide YouTube snackbars (HUD messages in player)
‚Ä¢ Added option to hide Products in Shorts
‚Ä¢ Added option to remove Comment bar in Shorts
‚Ä¢ Added option to remove Audio button in Shorts
‚Ä¢ Added option to exclude auto-dubbed audio tracks from selection
‚Ä¢ Added "Tap to seek gesture" in Player settings
‚Ä¢ Added system theme support for YTPlus player toast (playback speed, brightness, volume)

‚Ä¢ Enabling iPad-style interface now also enables floating keyboard

‚Ä¢ Updated YouTube to 20.33.2

‚Ä¢ Updated Tweak to 5.2b3

privacy.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This lets you upload media you've already created.
